column4: hello... i just got Ubuntu working with wireless! This is wonderful!
i am trying to install Nvidia drivers, but in my X configuration the "driver" is NV
should i change nv to nvidia in my xorg.conf

otherwise edit manually /etc/X11/xorg.conf to change the Driver section
2006-06-03T05:01:00.000Z	omirix		from nv to nvidia.
give me a sec to get command
otherwise edit manually /etc/X11/xorg.conf to change the Driver section
part of learning is taking risks
normally when bash says to try this its normally a good idea to try it
